subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Grant was the first driver to go faster than 200 miles per hour in an Indy-style racecar but may be best remembered for his heartbreaking defeats.
snippet: Mr. Grant was the first driver to go faster than 200 miles per hour in an Indy-style racecar but may be best remembered for his heartbreaking defeats.
